name: Capo Coda
description:
Deadly goat jams to your music, but there's NO REFUGE! Punch it out!

Made at TOJAM12 by Terence Cheong (@tresordif_games)

How to Play

1. Select some music
2. Dodge the goat
3. Counterattack!

Controls

Xbox Controller

D-Pad - Dodge Left/Right/Down
A - Left Punch
B - Right Punch
Back - Exit

Keyboard

Arrows - Dodge Left/Right/Down
Z - Left Punch
X - Right Punch
Esc - Exit

Hints

Blue = Right
Red = Left
White = Down
